name: Splunk
description: SIEM platform for log analysis, threat detection, and incident response

tools: list_saved_searches — List saved searches and reports

setup_steps: 1. Create a Splunk API token with search capabilities
2. Restrict the token to specific indexes (do not grant all-index access)
3. Set SPLUNK_URL to your Splunk instance (e.g., https://splunk.company.com:8089)
4. Store token in Vault or environment variable
security_notes: Use a read-only token — MCP should not modify Splunk configs
Restrict token to security-relevant indexes only
Set search time limits to prevent resource exhaustion
Audit token usage via Splunk's internal audit logs
